text: Yalli usuk kaak-sa Qibaada cakkisita Yalli kak Aanee waa Yalla kinni, usuk dudda-le manoy isi Nabna celta-ley Rabe waa kinni, usuk isi ginoh Amol yaniih isi ginok maceyta, Qunduugul kaa mabeyaay Xin kaa mabeya, usuk Qaranwal tanim kee Baaxô Bagul tanim inkih-le, maa- Numuuy Yallih xaqul Shafaaqatta Abtu duddam Yallih idinih Aba kaa Akke waytek! Num maaba! Akeerâ caagiidak keenik foocal tanim yaaxigeeh Addunyâ caagiidak warrayteemiy keenik wadiril Raqte yaaxigeh, usun kay ixxigak tu-mayaaxigan usuk faxaamay usuk ken Barsa Akke waytek, kay kursi Qaranwaa kee Baaxô farakkah duddu hayta, Yallal ken Nammayih (Qaran kee Baaxo kinnuk) dacayri kaal maqilsi, usuk isi ginok iro Raaqaah fayya iyyaah kulliimik Nabah
